mapper.select: SELECT A.NOTI_ID , A.BOARD_ID , A.CATE_ID , A.UP_NOTI_ID , A.NOTI_KIND , A.NOTI_TITLE , A.NOTI_CONTS , A.NOTI_URL , A.NOTI_OPN_DIV , A.FB_REG_YN , A.DEL_YN , A.STAT_CD , A.NOTI_READ_CNT , A.NOTI_OK_CNT , A.NOTI_NG_CNT , A.WRITE_IP , A.NOTI_BGN_DTTM , A.NOTI_END_DTTM , A.SCRAP_CNT , A.NOTI_OPN_CNT , A.REG_ID , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( A.REG_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AS CHAR(19) ) REG_DTTM , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DTTM , A.REF , A.RESTEP , A.RELEVEL , B.APND_FILE_SEQ , B.APND_FILE_ORGN , B.APND_FILE_NM , B.APND_FILE_PATH FROM NOTI_INFO A ,NOTI_APND_FILE B WHERE A.REG_ID= #{userId} AND A.NOTI_ID = B.NOTI_ID AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = A.NOTI_ID) ORDER BY A.${order} DESC LIMIT #{fromLimit}, #{toLimit}

SELECT COUNT(A.NOTI_ID) CNT FROM NOTI_INFO A ,NOTI_APND_FILE B WHERE A.REG_ID= #{userId} AND A.NOTI_ID = B.NOTI_ID AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = A.NOTI_ID)

SELECT PSN_OPN_SEQ , USER_ID , UP_PSN_OPN_SEQ , OPN_CONTS , WRITE_IP , REF , RELEVEL , RESTEP , DEL_YN , REG_ID , REG_DTTM , UPD_ID , UPD_DTTM FROM PSN_OPN WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PSN_OPN_SEQ = #{psnOpnSeq} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.USER_ID ,B.USER_NM ,A.PSN_OPN_SEQ ,A.UP_PSN_OPN_SEQ ,A.OPN_CONTS ,A.REF ,A.RELEVEL ,A.RESTEP ,CAST( DATE_FORMAT( A.UPD_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AS CHAR(19) ) UPD_DTTM ,B.USER_FILE_NM ,B.USER_FILE_PATH FROM PSN_OPN A ,PSN_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY A.REF DESC, A.RESTEP ASC LIMIT #{toLimit}

SELECT C.NOTI_ID , C.BOARD_ID , C.CATE_ID , C.UP_NOTI_ID , C.NOTI_KIND , C.NOTI_TITLE , C.NOTI_CONTS , C.NOTI_URL , C.NOTI_OPN_DIV , C.FB_REG_YN , C.DEL_YN , C.STAT_CD , C.NOTI_READ_CNT , C.NOTI_OK_CNT , C.NOTI_NG_CNT , C.WRITE_IP , C.NOTI_BGN_DTTM , C.NOTI_END_DTTM , C.SCRAP_CNT , C.NOTI_OPN_CNT , C.REG_ID , C.REG_DTTM , C.UPD_ID , C.UPD_DTTM , C.REF , C.RESTEP , C.RELEVEL , E.USER_NM , E.USER_FILE_NM , E.USER_FILE_PATH , D.APND_FILE_ORGN , D.APND_FILE_NM , D.APND_FILE_PATH FROM USER_SCRAP_INFO A ,PSN_USER B ,NOTI_INFO C ,NOTI_APND_FILE D ,PSN_USER E WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID AND C.NOTI_ID = D.NOTI_ID AND D.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID) AND C.REG_ID = E.USER_ID AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.REG_DTTM DESC LIMIT #{fromLimit}, #{toLimit}

SELECT COUNT(A.NOTI_ID) CNT FROM USER_SCRAP_INFO A ,PSN_USER B ,NOTI_INFO C ,NOTI_APND_FILE D ,PSN_USER E WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID AND C.NOTI_ID = D.NOTI_ID AND D.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID) AND C.REG_ID = E.USER_ID AND C.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT C.NOTI_ID , C.BOARD_ID , C.CATE_ID , C.UP_NOTI_ID , C.NOTI_KIND , C.NOTI_TITLE , C.NOTI_CONTS , C.NOTI_URL , C.NOTI_OPN_DIV , C.FB_REG_YN , C.DEL_YN , C.STAT_CD , C.NOTI_READ_CNT , C.NOTI_OK_CNT , C.NOTI_NG_CNT , C.WRITE_IP , C.NOTI_BGN_DTTM , C.NOTI_END_DTTM , C.SCRAP_CNT , C.NOTI_OPN_CNT , C.REG_ID , C.REG_DTTM , C.UPD_ID , C.UPD_DTTM , C.REF , C.RESTEP , C.RELEVEL , B.USER_NM , B.USER_FILE_NM , B.USER_FILE_PATH , D.APND_FILE_ORGN , D.APND_FILE_NM , D.APND_FILE_PATH FROM NOTI_INFO C LEFT OUTER JOIN NOTI_APND_FILE D ON (C.NOTI_ID = D.NOTI_ID AND D.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID)) ,PSN_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND C.REG_ID = B.USER_ID AND C.STAT_CD = '9' /* tmp save code */ ORDER BY C.REG_DTTM DESC LIMIT #{fromLimit}, #{toLimit}

SELECT COUNT(C.NOTI_ID) CNT FROM NOTI_INFO C LEFT OUTER JOIN NOTI_APND_FILE D ON (C.NOTI_ID = D.NOTI_ID AND D.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID)) ,PSN_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND C.REG_ID = B.USER_ID AND C.STAT_CD = '9' /* tmp save code */
